metadata.name: Among the stars
metadata.description:
Location: Ladakh
Camera: Sony A6500
Lens: 18-105 mm

When humans connect with nature for a significant portion of their lives, they often experience a rebirth. Once we recognise that we are an integral part of nature, the enchantment commences. There's a certain beauty to be found in sleeping under the stars that adds a melodic quality to life.
